comments.content: Please fix this door or something

Building.content:
On your re-submittal, this page must be properly oriented, meaning upright, not sideways or upside down, so that the document can be viewed without rotation. Failure to submit correctly oriented plans may result in a ‘Hold’ being placed on the submittal, which will delay plan review.

See City of Manteca, Electronic Plan Submittal Requirements:

https://www.ci.manteca.ca.us/CommunityDevelopment/Building%20Safety%20Division/Building%20Safety%20Documents/Handouts%20and%20Resources/Electronic%20Plan%20Submittal%20Requirements.pdf

Once the General Building correction items of this letter have been addressed, a partial permit for the “Building White box“ (unfinished tenant spaces) only may be issued with the condition that responsibility for compliance with subsequent code provisions for the complete building rests with the owner/the owner’s agents and/or the permittee. Additional building permits are required for work beyond the scope of this permit. Additional building permits are required for the finishing of the tenant spaces and work beyond the scope of this permit.(M.R. 1300.0130 Subpart8

instructions:
The items noted below require correction or clarification before this Plan Check submittal can be approved for permit issuance. Each line item includes a comment number and a sheet number, if applicable, for easy reference to the reviewed plans. Please resubmit all your revised plans, using the same filename, page order and sheet description provided in the original submittal. Place new sheets at the bottom of the file. If sheets have been removed, place an empty page in their place. The items noted below require correction or clarification before this Plan Check submittal can be approved for permit issuance.
